ygData.subject: Re: Bad Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I did get scolded once though: What happened to the Solesek Champion?  WTF? Ooops, hit the charm hot key instead of anthem.  Sorry Take that off your
ygData.messageBody:
Taneran wrote:
----------
I did get scolded once though:
"What happened to the Solesek Champion? WTF?"
"Ooops, hit the charm hot key instead of anthem. Sorry"
"Take that off your hot key now please"
"No prob, already gone 8)"
----------

Heh, I had a similar experience in the Ghost room in Unrest at a time when
the party was not in the best of shape, and hadn't been keeping the hall as
clear due to a couple linkdeaths.

Ranger: "Why is he [the ghost] running??"
<Bard looks and sees "flees in terror">
Bard: "Uhm, EVAC"
<At North Karana spires>
Bard whistles innocently.

Raiel Kendan, Traveling Minstrel of Karana
